title: Protectors of Industries cartoon - workers lives

content.description: Question refers to the 1883 image below.
content.question: Which of the following most directly affected the lives of the late-nineteenth-century workers?

choices.label: Groups that advocated for women’s voting rights
Alternative visions of a good society offered through utopianism
Political machines that provided social services in exchange for votes

content.answer: Political machines that provided social services in exchange for votes

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
